articles.author: AMANDA SEITZ
articles.title: New weight loss drugs are out of reach for millions of older Americans because Medicare won't pay - The Associated Press
articles.description: Obesity drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound are capturing the attention of celebrities and showing promising results in helping people shed pounds. But those drugs remain out of reach for millions of older Americans. A decades-old law bans Medicare from paying for…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) New obesity drugs are showing promising results in helping some people shed pounds but the injections will remain out of reach for millions of older Americans because Medicare is forb… [+8793 chars]
